## Vendor

This directory contains modules sourced directly from the [Playwright](https://github.com/microsoft/playwright) project. These files have been vendored to support local modifications and ensure compatibility with our custom runtime environment.

Source References
- `playwright/common`: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/tree/3089df7944029f8a09b4f3dd72de8a585cad148f/packages/playwright/src/common
- `playwright/isomorphic`: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/tree/3089df7944029f8a09b4f3dd72de8a585cad148f/packages/playwright-core/src/utils/isomorphic
- `playwright/reporters`: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/tree/3089df7944029f8a09b4f3dd72de8a585cad148f/packages/playwright/src/reporters
- `playwright/types`: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/tree/3089df7944029f8a09b4f3dd72de8a585cad148f/packages/playwright/types
- `playwright/utils`: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/blob/3089df7944029f8a09b4f3dd72de8a585cad148f/packages/playwright-core/src/utils.ts

Huge thanks to the Playwright team and its contributors for their outstanding open-source work! ❤️
